events.name: IGDA x AWS BYOG
events.description:
Another year, and we're kicking off with another great event.

This time the event is all about Bring Your Own Game, with a bunch of cool Singaporean developers showcasing games in development or recently released, and talking about the process. We're also setting up tables near the pizza, and are inviting YOU to bring along your own game to showcase it to your peers. 

We'll also find out the latest news about Global Game Jam 2016, held at Republic Polytechnic for the 7th year running, and about an exciting new initiative to help level up Game Writing in Singapore.

The event's open to everyone interested in game development, so come join us! 
 
Location: AWS, 23 Church st. Level 8, Singapore 049481
Date: Wednesday 20th January.
Time: 19.00 onwards. We'll follow up the presentations with pizza, beer and playing games, then retire to Kazbar for networking afterwards.  

A huge thanks again to our hosts at AWS for helping organize this, and providing the pizza!

Happy New Year, everyone!

the IGDA Singapore team

events.name: DUPLICATE (HackerspaceSG Awesome Talks, January 2016)
events.description: The live event page is at https://web.facebook.com/events/564759870365582/
